item.title: Dgraph 图数据库试用
item.description: Fast, Transactional, Distributed Graph Database. 简介 Dgraph is a horizontally scalable and distributed graph database, providing ACID transactions, consistent replication and linearizable reads. It's built from ground up to perform for a rich set of queries. Being a native graph database, it tightly controls how the data is arranged on disk to optimize for query performance and throughput, reducing disk seeks and network calls in a cluster. Dgraph's goal
